body:
Thanks for the issue and proposed doc fix, @jlisee! 
cc @Wyverald to take a look and confirm
@jlisee Thanks for reporting, happy to review the PR!

issue.title: Update bzlmod migration to mention enable_bzlmod

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

labels.name: team-Documentation
labels.description: Documentation improvements that cannot be directly linked to other team labels

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body: It the migration guide make sure to explicitly tell the user to update their `.bazelrc` with the `--enable_bzlmod` so that Bzlmod will be active.  This resolves #19561

body:
> @jlisee Thanks for reporting, happy to review the PR!

PR up at https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/pull/19574
